summary: THE TRANSMISSION CLIPPED AS TO A 4TH REPLACED FAULTY CLUTCH WHILE BACKING INTO THE GARAGE. THE CAR JERKED BACKWARDS OUT OF KNOW WHERE AND HIT THE SIDE OF THE GARAGE WHILE BACKING IN TO PARK. THE REAR FENDER, BUMPER AND PARKING AID SENSORS ARE NOW DAMAGED THANK YOU TO A FAULTY TRANSMISSION AND CLUTCH. I AM TIRED OF NOT FEELING SAFE WITH MY DAUGHTER IN THE CAR.    *TR
